game.name: Circle of Bosses
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Adjustable Text Size, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Circle of Bosses is a realtime tactics game that provides the complex mechanics of MMO-like Bosses but on a singleplayer experience. Tactical combat with a top-down view where the player assumes the role of a guild leader that can give instructions to AI characters.
